title: How will you prepare 100% H2SO4? - Quora

response.answer_text: Preparing 100% H2SO4 is quite difficult. But still we can go as far as 99.99% H2SO4. To do so firstly we need to prepare the less concentrated H2SO4. Then through the different methods(specifically dehydration methods) we can make it more concentrated. For the more info. Do check it
